00001 import wx
00002 import wx.lib.plot as libplot
00003 from gui import feedbackpanel
00004 
00005 class PlotPanel(feedbackpanel.FeedbackPanel):
00006     def __init__(self, parent, id, data, data_max):
00007         feedbackpanel.FeedbackPanel.__init__(self, parent, id)
00008 
00009         plot = libplot.PlotCanvas(self)
00010         self.id = id
00011 
00012         problem_size = data_max
00013         target = [(0,0), (data_max,data_max)]
00014         candidate = [(0,0), (data_max, data)]
00015 
00016         target_line = libplot.PolyLine(target, legend='Target', colour='green', width=3)
00017         candidate_line = libplot.PolyLine(candidate, legend='Candidate', colour='red', width=3)
00018         gc = libplot.PlotGraphics([target_line, candidate_line], '', '', '')
00019 
00020         plot.Draw(gc, xAxis= (0,problem_size), yAxis= (0,problem_size))
00021         plot.SetEnableLegend(True)
00022         plot.SetGridColour('black')
00023 
00024         self.sizer.Add(plot, 1, wx.EXPAND)
00025         self.Layout()
00026
